caption.p: Cytotoxicity profile of Ocimum viride (leaf) essential oil against various cancer cell lines. (A) In vitro cytotoxic activity of Ocimum viride (leaf) essential oil against human cancer cell lines viz., DU-145 (prostate), HEP-2 (liver), IMR-32 (neuroblastoma) and HT-29, 502713, SW-620 (colon). (B) Cytotoxicity of EO against the most susceptible cell line HT29.
